levels.description:
Passive: Restores <@ba.vup>{sp}</> SP upon being attacked
Activation Effect: Deals <@ba.vdown>{value}</> Arts damage per second to all friendly and ground enemy units in range for <@ba.vup>{duration}</> seconds, and additionally slows the Movement Speed of enemies by <@ba.vup>-{-move_speed:0%}</> and causes them to gain <@ba.vdown>{energy}</> Energy
